name: Shark Bite - Epic Hungry Death Strike
name_original: Shark Bite - Epic Hungry Death Strike
description:
+++ 48-hour discount! 100% FREE! Shark-ahoy! +++

“Beach Graphics Are Cool”
“Make Long Tail of Life-saving Tubes”
“Keep the Shark in the Water”
______________________________________

Collect as many victims as you can! In this game, you are the shark! Shark’s motion is towards at the bottom end of the screen by default. You have to touch the screen with your thumb or finger until the shark comes up to an adequate level. But as the shark moves up, you have to prevent it to touching the top side of the screen too and to do that, you have to release your finger from the screen. So, overall, you have to keep the shark in the middle. And, in its journey shark will encounter some delicious victims, which the shark has to collect. Those victims will make a trail behind the shark. Collect as much victims as you can. And, if the shark comes in contact with the top or the bottom level of the screen, which is also the beach shore, they it will die and game will be over for you.

+++ Game Features +++
“Touch Sensor Game”
“Great Time Killer”
“Make victims and Score High”
